alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Northeast Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 7:53AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN SAN MIGUEL COUNTY THROUGH 830 AM MDT... At 753 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Romeroville, or 8 miles south of Las Vegas, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Las Vegas, Romeroville, Montezuma, Tecolote, Storrie Lake State Park, Sapello, Chapelle, San Agustin, Ojitos Frios and San Geronimo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 330 and 357. State Road 104 between Mile Markers 1 and 16. State Road 65 between Mile Markers 1 and 10. State Road 266 near Mile Marker 0. State Road 283 between Mile Markers 1 and 11. State Road 518 between Mile Markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Northeast Highlands
